methods.comment:
* Format a date range. This is our slightly more sensible internal API.
     * A truly reasonable replacement would take a skeleton instead of int flags.

methods.name: private static android.icu.text.DateIntervalFormat getFormatter(String skeleton, ULocale locale, android.icu.util.TimeZone icuTimeZone)
